article_text:
Manhattan lunchers looking for a tender leg of lamb or an Italian-style pork roast without breaking a C-note or sitting down for an hour have a new ally in Au Jus, a purveyor of fine roasted meats on the Upper East Side.

"It's not so easy to find these things unless you're sitting in a very good restaurant," said co-owner Phil Bozzo, who opened Au Jus over the summer after helming the popular Fifth Avenue Epicure, in the Flatiron District, for more than two decades. "Our idea was to have it be...
